page.title: 18Children and home computers
page.content:
In Class 3 at West Haddon School 12 children out of 18 have a home computer.
The most common computer is the Spectrum 48k.There is also one Commodore 64,one B.B.C., one Acorn Electron, one Osborne, and one Philips. The favourite game for the Spectrum is "Jet Set Willy" which is about a man called Mr. Willy who has just bought a mansion and he hasn't explored it properly yet. He has just had a party and he has to clear everything up before he can go to bed. The computers are kept mostly in the bedrooms but some are kept in living rooms or a study, and one is kept under the T.V. The average time the computers are used is 9 hours a week.
